column5: Can anyone recommend a good site for used fire arms in Canada? I have been to a couple different ones and they seem shady or loaded with popups.. Help! lol
What are you looking for? PM FOR A LOCAL GUY HERE.
Ellwood Epps on hwy 11 just north of Orillia has a good selection of used firearms.  I have an Ithaca 12 gage pump for sale.  PM me if you wish.
I want to get my mitts on an old ENFIELD 2A1 BOLT ACTION .308 RIFLE also looking for a nice over under break action shotgun of some sort..
Canadian Gun nutz That was the site a friend of mine told me about I couldn't remember the name for the life of me

CGN is the place you want to go.  You'll have to register and apply for access to the equipment exchange.  Watch the prices carefully.  As anywhere, there are some great deals to be had, but sometimes guys ask ridiculous sums.  There is a trader rating system in place, and most guys are very good to deal with, although some people won't deal with someone with no trader rating.  Have fun.

I want to get my mitts on an old ENFIELD 2A1 BOLT ACTION .308 RIFLE also looking for a nice over under break action shotgun of some sort..  Over under what gauge?   Will stop by and see what they have. It,s on my way to and back from  a river.
Many good deals in the Middle East these days.  Al Simmons on Locke St. in Hamilton is good choice, still there, I just checked his website.
ENFIELD 2A1 BOLT ACTION .308 RIFLE, interesting I thought they were all .303.

I want to pick up a .243 for wolf hunting here. Tons of them around my area and the hides are worth close to $1,000 a piece. A fella could make some extra $$$$$ whacking predators in his spare time. Take the gun on sledding and ice fishing trips just in case. Saw a giant wolf a few years ago on a lake not too far out of town. Had to go between 175 and 200 pounds!!!
Are you on Facebook? I am in 2 really good Canadian groups.
Are you on Facebook? I am in 2 really good Canadian groups. I am what groups are you on? id love to join them..
